nodes.text: Gathal Danager was a free-trader during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 ABY, he met Lando Calrissian on Taanab, who took a bet that he could defeat a band of space pirates, the Norulac Freebooters. Gathal Danager lost the bet with Calrissian's victory at the Battle of Taanab and Danager lost the deed of a small Clendoran brewery to Calrissian.
